H0.text: the era of the great mughals began with the accession of. Akbar

H1.text: the era of the great mughals began with the accession of. Humayun

H2.text: the era of the great mughals began with the accession of. Shah Jahan

H3.text: the era of the great mughals began with the accession of. Babur

A4.text: Akbar gradually enlarged the Mughal Empire to include much of the Indian subcontinent through Mughal military, political, cultural, and economic dominance.

A5.text: Akbar made clear that he would stay in India, reintroducing the historical legacy of the Timurid Renaissance, in contrast to his grandfather and father, who reigned as transient rulers.
